sentences.sentence: So here, I chose to crop out most of the sky as it would just look unbalanced to have such an unvaried texture taking up a large portion of my image.
sentences.translation: 所以我选择裁掉大部分天空，因为让一片没有变化的材质占据画面的一大部分会显得不平衡。

sentences.sentence: There should be no united timing records on timecards, i. e. , unvaried starting time and ending time for several consecutive days for the several employees.
sentences.translation: 不能有统一的打卡记录，即不能有某些员工有连续几天的上下班时间都是一样的。

sentences.sentence: An unvaried pall of cloud muffled the whole expanse of sky from zenith to horizon.
sentences.translation: 一望无际的云幕蒙住了从天顶到地乎线的整个夜空。
